DOC.detailed_description: Patients LUTO come clinical evaluation part standard clinical care Fetal Center . The standardized prenatal management plan fetuses LUTO describe detail bellow . All pregnant woman carry fetus LUTO assign nurse coordinator prenatal record obtain . The multidisciplinary team ( maternal-fetal intervention team , pediatric urologist , pediatric nephrologist , neonatologist , genetic counselor fetal cardiologist ) notify . A one-day visit plan follow : 1. fetal comprehensive ultrasound schedule confirmation diagnosis , investigation associate anomaly evaluation prognostic factor ; 2. genetic counseling perform fetal invasive test ( FISH/fetal karyotype/fetal CMA ) offer patient ; 3 . Fetal echocardiogram also perform evaluate presence associate cardiac anomaly fetal cardiac function ; 4 . A consultation Fetal Intervention team ( maternal-fetal specialty ) schedule well . If gestational age le 18 week isolated LUTO confirm ultrasonography , patient give option prenatal expectant management , fetal intervention termination pregnancy . If patient elect proceed fetal intervention , vesico-amniotic shunting perform patient follow ultrasound week . In case shunt migrates seem obstruct , offer repeat procedure patient . If patient elect proceed expectant management , follow-up every 4 week . Delivery date type delivery depend obstetrical indication . For fetus gestational age great 18 less 30 week , oligohydramnios present , investigation fetal renal biochemistry offer . In case favorable fetal renal biochemistry , vesico-amniotic shunt offer fetal therapeutic intervention . In case fetal urinary biochemistry consider favorable , repeat urinary examination 24 hour . If fetal urinary biochemistry still favorable , repeat examination last time ( maximum 3 time ) . If still favorable , fetal vesico-amniotic shunt offer . However , fetal urinary examination reveals improvement favorable urinary biochemistry ) , fetal vesico-amniotic shunting consider . Prenatal follow-up delivery follow algorithm describe previously . If gestational age great 30 week less 34 week isolated LUTO diagnose , fetal intervention offer oligohydramnios present . If oligohydramnios identify , fetal intervention offer patient followed delivery . Delivery date type delivery depend obstetrical indication . For fetus gestational age great 34 week , oligohydramnios present , pre-term delivery indicate . If normal amount amniotic fluid see , patient follow weekly ultrasound examination delivery term . Fetuses associated anomaly independent gestational age undergo investigation fetal magnetic resonance image evaluation multidisciplinary team . All infant LUTO routine standard clinical care . All infant LUTO evaluate postnatally pediatric urology nephrology service may need surgical intervention . At birth , clinical evaluation include renal ultrasound , void cysto-urethrogram ( VCUG ) well clinical laboratory examination serum creatinine , sodium , calcium , potassium chloride , urine analysis perform part standard clinical care . The infant follow every 6 month 24 month life , annually afterwards . Information routine examination collect document .
